```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)

data <- read.csv("RData.csv", colClasses=c("Date"="character"), na.strings = c("", "NA"))
data <- data%>% mutate(Date = as.Date(as.character(Date), "%m/%d/%Y"))

list <- colnames(data)
list <- list[-c(1,2)]



```

```{r ,echo=FALSE}
selectInput(inputId="var", label="variables", choices=list, selected=list[[1]], multiple=FALSE)

renderPlot({
  test<-data%>%filter(!is.na(data[[input$var]]))
  ggplot(test, aes(x=Date, y=test[[input$var]]))+geom_line()
  })









```
